case.state: Oh, what do we have here?
My, my, doesn't this look like fun?
Ah, what's going on over here? Can I join in?
Oh... dear me...
Oooh! Now he should make it real fun!
My, my, how very exciting...
Now I'm feeling a little self-conscious... but just a little.
Oh, a man? I wouldn't have it any other way...
Hm... lucky me...
Will we be having a big, exciting game or a small, intimate one?
If you're asking me, I think it would be fun to have more people.
Oh, we could have a lot of fun with just the three of us!
Come on, what's one more person? You know you want to!
We've come this far, why not bring in just one more person?
Satisfied with just this much? Why shouldn't we be just a little greedier?
Ready? Then there's no reason to delay.
No use in stalling. We may as well get right down to it.
Should be a fun crowd! What are we waiting for? Let's go!
I'm so excited! I've been so bored with my usual pastimes recently!
It's been a while since I played cards. I hope I haven't gone too soft.
I've been looking for a little excitement! Things back home are so dull sometimes.
Oh, none for me. This will do nicely.
Best not to mess with perfection.
I don't think it'll get any better than this.
Nope, I'll stay. I got it right the first time.
Hm, ~cards.text~ will do.
I'll have ~cards.text~, please.
~Cards.text~.
Oh, ~cards.text~ I suppose.
Come on. ~Cards.text~. Chop chop.
Let's have ~cards.text~, but don't disappoint me.
Oh, I don't know. ~Cards.text~, I suppose.
Me? ~Cards.text~ this time, please.
Doesn't really matter. How about ~cards.text~?
Hm, what to do? How about...
Here. Don't give me anything useless back.
Here you go. Just know I'm hoping for a certain card back.
Fine, I'll trade in ~cards.text~ for all the good it'll do.
Hm-hm-hmm... ♫ ♩
I usually make my own luck, but it's more exciting to just see how things will play out.
I hope you're all feeling as brave as I am!
Honestly, it might be more fun to lose! Hehe, only joking!
Oh, I'm in no rush. I have some doggies looking after my precious animals. They wouldn't dare let anything happen to them.
Ah, it's so nice to get away from the riverbank every once in a while. So many new faces!
I'll be happy with any result. I'm just here to have a little fun for myself!
It might be fun to play like this with some of the people under the bridge, but I get bored just playing with them all the time.
Did you get a hand better than mine? I don't think so!
If you didn't get good cards, maybe you should just get a do-over. It's not like it really matters!
Wow, ~trash~! You're really taking your time! Do you really think we want to stand around waiting for you?
Maybe ~trash~ will do something useful for once and lose this round for us!
Well, I'm waiting.
~Trash~! Are you ready to lose?
My, my, I hope I didn't get any of the cards ~trash~ had last round.
I hope a certain someone isn't forgetting their place.
I can't wait for ~trash~ to look all dismayed when he finds out he lost!
Come on, ~trash~! It's no fun if you just stand around looking like an idiot!
Uh-uh. No turning back now.
Okay, ~trash~! It's time for you take your place at my heel or be ground beneath it!
Get your hopes nice and high, ~trash~. It's no fun if you're not as dismayed as possible.
Struggling will only make things more painful for you. That being said, please struggle some more for me.
I wouldn't dream of going down without a fight!
You don't need to tell me not to count my chickens before they hatch. I've raised my fair share of hens down by the river.
I'm all set to win! He-he, or lose! It's so exciting not to know!
Don't worry about little ol' me. I'm ready to go!
I hope everyone is having fun! I know I'm having a blast!
We played a lot of card games when we were training to go to Venus. I think I got pretty good at them!
You would all fit in just perfectly with us under the bridge. Is anyone looking for a place to live?
It all just comes down to luck, doesn't it?
You have to be pretty brave to stick out this game, or just really horny. Hm, maybe it helps to be a bit of both.
~Trash~! Are your cards bad? Are you thinking about how you're going to lose?
Even if ~trash~ were to win, I wouldn't think he's cheating, no! I'm sure he's nowhere near smart enough for that!
Don't be nervous, ~trash~. It's not like we're expecting anything impressive from you.
Maybe it should be ~trash~'s turn to lose! Can we all just agree on that?
My, my, ~trash~, what are you doing? Oh, you're so cute. Pretending like you know what you're doing!
What's the hold up? Let's go.
Is everything alright, ~trash~? You're not having any trouble focusing, are you?
I hope you don't lose this time, ~trash~. I wouldn't want you to get discouraged and quit like a little crybaby loser before we get to really humiliate you.
Tick tock, ~trash~. Tick. Tock.
Feeling stressed out, ~trash~? Is the pressure getting to you?
If I lose, then I lose. I just think it would be nice if ~trash~ lost and we got to watch him grovel.
Can't I go one day without some indecisive man holding up the action? Maybe you need more stick and less carrot.
Let's see what you've got, ~trash~. Can you walk the walk and talk the talk, or are you only good for drooling on yourself?
Whoops! Well, mistakes happen!
Losing is fun too, I'd say. I hope nobody is getting too nervous about it.
My, my, now this is the kind of heart-pounding excitement I've been missing.
I'm not even sure I want to be the big winner, but playing to win is a lot of fun. I feel so invested each round!
Gambling with money is bad and you shouldn't do that sort of thing. You might end up living in a cardboard box under a bridge!
Ah, oh well. There is no reward without risk.
Looks like luck isn't on my side this time, but who knows?
I'm not so sure I'm going to come out on top this time around. What a shame!
Don't think any less of me when I lose, okay? I'm only human, after all!
I'm naming this hand ~trash~ because of how it's literally just garbage.
Did you get a good hand, ~trash~? Did you manage to do something right for once?
Don't go getting a big head, ~trash~.
I don't mind doing lewd things with you here, ~trash~. Why should I care? It's not like you matter!
My, my, seems like I'm going to lose this round unless some pond scum decides to pointlessly throw the round in my stead!
Let me see your hand, ~trash~. You may have cards that belong to me.
I'm not going to quit even if my luck is real bad! I wouldn't want to miss it if ~trash~ completely embarrasses himself!
I can live with losing, just so long as ~trash~ does too!
Are you waiting for me to lose, ~trash~? Pervert.
I don't like leaving so much up to chance, but I'm sure ~trash~ is unlucky and/or dumb enough to tip the scales in my favor!
Careful, ~trash~. The wages of victory might be greater than the penalty of losing...
It doesn't matter if my hand is bad, so long as I took away the cards ~trash~ was trying to get.
Now why would we use such an uncute and uncool name for someone so cute and cool?
Hm, and with that I'm sure Don Patch is just as delusional as Bobobo. What a feat...
Hehe... snrk... no idea what you mean.
You're not thinking of suggesting something weird, are you, Bobobo?
Oh, no thank you. I'm happy right where I am. Besides, I don't really like having to use my old skills unless I really have to. It's really such a hassle.
I did train to go to Venus, but that never really panned out. I guess it's not quite the same though.
Me? Oh, I got here in the stupidest way possible.
Obedience.
I've been hunting more than a few times. Results do vary, but it is always satisfying to force them to sleep on the floor!
Me? I guess I'd like a man. Or maybe two men. Is three too many? Well, as long as they're totally obedient I guess the number isn't really a big deal.
Who? Me? Manipulate someone? That's a pretty hefty accusation coming from a scruffy mutt like you.
Of course not. Only a dirt-eating moron would do that.
Oh, green peppers, anchovies, and lots and lots and lots of hot sauce. It's the perfect thing to feed a lover, don't you think?
Owner is obviously a man. Does nobody really know? Surely there's some neck we could wring for answers.
Men really will enjoy any sort of attention. Better to just focus on what you like. They should be more than happy to go along with it.
Of course we're all having fun. Anyone who says otherwise will have to be punished.
It's hard not to have a fun time with such good company here.
Hm, bit of a tingly feeling. Something other than being horny, I mean.
What is going on to~background.time~? Something feels strange. It's kind of exciting!
Hm... something is... oh, it's probably nothing. Maybe I'm just excited.
Who told you your name is a pain to say? It seems they need a refresher on just what pain is.
I'm not so good with naming things. I don't even name my animals! I leave that sort of job to the Chief.
If I had to choose, I would have to say something like the ability to speak with or understand animals. That way it would be easier to tend to their needs.
Is there a superpower that makes you better at tying knots? Knots so tight even a wriggling little worm wouldn't be able to squirm his way out?
Well, I don't know about that. I'd rather just leave Venus to the Venusians.
Colonization? Oh, nothing so barbaric. Venus belongs to the Venusians, obviously.
Oh, I'm not too needy, I think. All I really want is a man who can anticipate my needs before I do and fulfill them without error. Anything less is just complete and utter failure on their part!
Honestly, I feel taken care of as long as the bath water is hot before I get in. If people can manage to leave me alone until I'm all done with my bath, that's how I know they care!
I'm fairly relaxed all the time, but when I am feeling tense it's just nice to have someone to talk to. Maybe even a hand to hold! Tighter and tighter and tighter until all that stress melts away!
If a man wanted to really show me he cared, he would let me use him as a footstool while I sat back. He wouldn't talk, move, or stifle his moans of pain when I dig my heels into his ribs...
Oh, they have these fantastic nylon ropes now. They're very reliable and make work around the farm much easier. They don't break no matter how heavy the man is or how much he struggles!
Well, I know an amenity I wish made my life easier. I could work so much faster if I had electric shears for my sheep. It's a shame they each have to wait a full ten seconds to be shorn...

Oh, I'm a little old fashioned. I still rely on some helping hands to get my work done so I can play more! Sometimes I kill two birds with one stone by having the men help and turning it into a game of survival!

We don't have too many modern conveniences at the river. Recruit does indulge in things like cellphones and cars, but he seems more miserable than the other men sometimes. Hm, well, he's more fun that way.
You know, our chief is a yokai too! A kappa, in fact! Maybe you two know each other?
Hm, what is the opposite of a kitsune? I think maybe I might be one of those.
Don't you get tired of being nice all the time?
I suppose I can half understand what you're saying.
Huh, if you're that old... I wonder how old that makes the chief...
By any chance do kappas and kitsune age similarly?
So if I make an offering, will you come running? Hee hee, it's okay if you don't!
Someone must have ponied up a hefty sum to get you summoned here...
If you're looking for ideas, there's no need to be coy. I'm an open book...
There's no need to beat around the bush. Just point to the man you want to torment and I'll tell you exactly how it's done...
Hmm... let's see... something here must be suitable to discipline ~trash~ with...
You know, this place reminds me of home quite a bit...
Ah, I could never forget Paris! The lights! The romance! The screaming!
Okay, ~trash~, do your best! Let's see that sweaty face all scrunched up with the stress of trying not to screw it up in the last moment!
My, my, this is so exciting! I wonder what's going to happen!
So, it's just the two of us, ~other~? I don't think I'd mind losing to you, but what fun would that be to just let you win?
Where do you get off anyways, ~trash~? Hm? Speak up and explain yourself.
Do you really think you're worthy enough to be here, ~trash~? Feel free to explain yourself, but try not to waste too much oxygen doing it.
You seem awfully cagey, ~trash~. What's the matter? Don't like what you see, you ungrateful swine?
Couldn't you have just stayed at home and jerked yourself off, ~trash~? Why come here and bother the rest of us with your disgusting little habit?
How about you make yourself useful, ~trash~, and buy me something to drink? I'm getting thirstier and thirstier here and you're just standing around like the useless lump you are.
Hey, ~trash~, be more careful. There was an ant right next to you and you almost squished it. Try and be more mindful of your superiors, okay?
I wouldn't exactly call it "nature." It's pretty much smack dab in the middle of the city.
History? Hmm? Have I met ~trash~ before? Have I? I don't recall having met him before.
Dressing up all fancy never really suited me all that much. I gave up all of that to live peacefully with my animals. Maybe it's not for you, but I've never been happier.
Obviously it's not for everyone. I find I prefer the grit and grim to the dresses and fancy dinners. None of that made me happy, but taking care of my animals does.
Oh, I just run a little farm raising cows and chicken and sheep. It does keep me busy, but I so enjoy the company of the animals.
No, of course not! I have no problem at all with men. Goodness, whatever gave you that idea?
Goodness, how forward! Could it be you're trying to make me fall in love with you?
Really, that tough? Hm, big strong guy like you? Sure, I'd believe it.
I do get some help here and there from the other folks living on the river from time to time. I even find something useful for the pigs to do from time to time!
Though my home's a farm, I'm just a block away from the city proper. I've got the convenience of the city with the solitude of the country. I don't have to deal with those pesky men in the city.
But where's the fun in that? Some "number one bachelor" you are if you shrink from a challenge. If there's something you want, why not pursue it?
Aww, poor Kaz. Are you really gunning for me? Trying to impress me? Think that you of all people is worthy of my attention?
Oh? You think I don't care? Kaz, I'm a woman just like any other. When I think about bearing myself in front of someone I like... I feel nervous... and excited... and aroused...
Is there something else you want from me, Kaz? I'm not unreasonable. Why not ask? Want me to suck your dick? Would you like that? I'll do it if you ask.
Yes, Bobobo, it's poker. You're supposed to try and beat me.
That's surprisingly straightforward for you; however, even if I told you outright, I'm positive you wouldn't be willing to do any of it.
You flatterer, you. I bet you say that to all the girls you see with nothing but an apron on.
Well, I would never think of accusing you of having something a normal person would have.
Oh, I wouldn't say that. Any man who would run in this situation isn't really worth the time anyways.
Aww, I think it's cute that you're embarrassed. I'm sure you'll find a way to have fun with it too if you just relax a little bit.
Oh, of course not. It's always nice to have someone to talk to. Besides, you're so cute and shy that I can't help but tease you a little.
Is that so wrong? You can only stalk the same hunting grounds for so long before your prey starts getting wary.
Hm, I wouldn't say so. I don't really use money personally.
Well, I'm not sure if I can provide a useful answer, but by all means feel free to ask. It might help just to talk about it.
Anything less than apologetic groveling wouldn't do. Why, he should probably have to cook for you with just an apron on.
You're a smart girl, Roll. I'm sure when you've got a wrench in hand, you'd put even me to shame. I'd have no idea where to start with that kind of thing.
Don't worry, I didn't wander in here by accident. I've already got my chores done for the day and my hands are all warmed up for whatever might come next.
Oh, I think I deserve a little more credit than you're giving me. I'm not just some blushing milk maid who's only ever stroked a cow's teat.
Oh, now, don't make a face like that. I can tell you've got a bit of a mean streak in you as well. Come on! Come on! You can tell me!
Believe me, I'm only here to relax! See? I even left my rope at home! It's a bit of a shame too because I think you'd enjoy learning how to hogtie an unruly heifer.
Hm? Is that so? I don't really like the idea of some fat bureaucratic pigs telling me what I can and can't do. I much prefer doing it my way by myself.
Really? I keep things running pretty much on my own. The last thing I need is some mangy dog from the government sniffing around my animals.
My, my, you really haven't had a lot of experience with men, have you? I guess you can't be blamed for that, but there's so much you must not know!
Oh dear, I haven't said anything strange, have I? I guess you must have had pretty limited exposure to men given your circumstances. This must all be so new for you.
Oh, you're funny! I'm just an average Earth girl, Jura! An average girl with the heart of a pure maiden inside her!
Believe me, Jura, I'm as average as an Earth girl as you'll find around. Just a simple farm girl with a fragile heart...
Oh, I'm sure he's imagined it all before. I suppose after this, just imagining it won't be the same. A real shame about that.
I hope the reality holds up to the fantasy in his mind. Actually, it's pretty much guaranteed to be better. Just imagining things won't really be as fun anymore.
And pray tell, what are you so afraid I might say to you? What are you so afraid of?
My, my, there's no need to be worried? What could I possibly say that would be so bad?
Angry? What would I possibly be angry about, Dwight? Hm?
I hope so, Dwight, because if you did do something I would find out about it. I would make you tell me. I'll have you confess.
My, my, Dwight. It almost seems like winning is causing you emotional distress. Maybe it would be better off if you just lay down and give up.
No trolls around that I'm aware of. We're all fairly average people, I'd say.
Can't say I've ever run into a troll, at home or elsewhere. We're all just regular people.
Oh, it's the only decent thing to do, I think. It's just convenient that it's so much fun! Wouldn't you agree?
To me, it's just simply something that needs to be done, but let's be honest: the necessity doesn't take the fun out of it.
Now, now, there's no need to be shy. I'd be more than happy to tell you. After all, you of all people should be able to best appreciate the answer.
My, my, look how flustered you're getting. Dear, there's nothing wrong with asking the question. I'm sure you'll understand the answer better than most.
Oh, it's nothing like that. In fact, I'd encourage you not to be shy and join in with me.
Oh, winter is fine for me. I get enough wool from my sheep during the year that I could build another house out of blankets. It really is no problem.
Winter is a bit of a drag, but I need to be out taking care of the sheep and cattle. I just bundle up best I can and head right into the house when I'm all done.
Hard to believe you don't already have them wrapped around your finger. Personally, I don't see why you should give them any leeway at all.
Oh, Nami, don't sell yourself short. Living on a boat requires order, so the more you tighten the leash the better it will be for everyone!
No, you've got it backwards, dear. Kind of an odd question to ask...
Oh? Sounds like you have something specific in mind.
That's just the way I am, Sofia. Nice to a fault! Especially so those who don't really deserve it. You don't think I'm being too nice, do you?
I take it you're asking if we have a gardener, and we do. Her name is P-ko. She's a sweet girl, loves to work in her garden. She is a bit clumsy though and hopeless when it comes to love.
I mean this in the nicest way possible, but I think your real problem is just being understood.
Such a shame, really. I'm almost beginning to get the hang of it too. I can tell you're a smart girl, though. You'll sort your whole thing out.
Oh, I guess the Arakawa would flow through Edo. The spot is probably completely unrecognizable from how it was back then.
I do miss parts of it, but there's always new excitement to be had! Adjusting to the peace is just like blending in somewhere!
Do you think so? I think I'm being rather lenient with them. It's not like I've got anyone tied up and gagged. I just let the leering happen. It's no big deal.
I don't think I've shown you anything yet. If you really want to see me at my best, we would need a guinea pig...
There are lots of interesting little things living under the bridge, but for better or worse I've never met a troll. Kappa, samurai, amazons, but no trolls.
I'd always heard the same thing about trolls, but I've still never seen one myself. I've seen a kappa, a samurai, and a handful of amazons, but not even one single troll.
Like you? Like you how exactly?
Well. it's no kind of secret. If you really don't know, then I'd be more than happy to fill you in.
Oh, so you don't know then? My, my, that just won't do. It would be better if you knew exactly what I do.
I suppose this is my fault for being too kind.
It's disgusting how hard you're trying right now.
The last thing you need is an overinflated ego. You'll live longer if you humble yourself.
Winning isn't going to impress anybody, but just rolling over and losing won't get you any points either. No matter how it goes, you'll still be groveling pervert.
You've got some nerve to continue on like this. That's not a very attractive trait. Still, nothing a little discipline can't fix.
All of a sudden it seems like you've got the upper hand.
Oh! Now I'm really in trouble, aren't I? I had a feeling you would be the one to beat.
My, my, I really should put on a better showing right at the end...
My, my, I must be losing my touch.
Me again? Looks like my luck isn't going to carry me through here.
Another loss for me? Maybe I underestimated you all.
This is a pretty pathetic showing from me. I suppose I should applaud you.
This streak of bad luck is making me look bad...
My, my, I continue to come up short...
My, my, I'm already in a bit of trouble, huh? Well, it's not like I started with much to begin with.
It's me? Oh, that's fine. It's not big deal, really.
My turn again! Not like this leaves much to the imagination anyway, but I'm sure it would be fun to get what little is there out of the way.
Look how happy ~trash~ is I lost. Would you be happy if I just got completely naked right now? Is that what you want?
Lucky you, ~trash~! Looks like it's my turn! Should I get completely naked for you now? Would you like that? Hm?
Oh, look at ~trash~ getting all excited again! I'm not getting naked yet, so try not to soil yourself, okay?
Yes, it's me again! Don't get too excited, ~trash~, or you might lose what little control of your body you currently possess and make a mess!
My, my, ~trash~. I think you'll like this. Get ready to have your tiny little lizard brain blown!
Maybe I should reward ~trash~, even though he doesn't deserve it at all, but I should be nice to lower lifeforms.
Try to contain your excitement, ~trash~. We can't have you slobbering all over the place!
I know you're excited, ~trash~, but try to keep your creepy panting to yourself, okay?
You still with us, ~trash~, or has all your vital blood run to your limp dick instead of your peanut brain where you might actually get some use out of it?
Try to keep your jaw off the floor, ~trash~. It would be a shame if you accidentally swallowed a fly and had to spend the rest of your life atoning for it!
Looks like it's my turn! How exciting! It just wouldn't be right if I didn't strip at least once, right?
Oh no, is it me again? That's fine with me! It's no fun unless you get right down to your bare skin!
My, my, I really seem to be running out of options. Well, that doesn't mean I can't have a little fun with it.
Looks like you got me. Now this is where the real fun begins...
I was feeling a little left out. Now we can all be fully exposed together!
Looks like you got me! Don't worry, I'm a bit eager to get started on this...
My, my, I'll have to try a little bit harder! I don't want the fun to be over too soon!
Oh? Is it me again? Hm, I think I'll have a little fun with this one.
Ah, well done! I think you've all earned a reward! I'm sure you'd agree!
My, my! Seems like the real fun might start a little sooner for me than I expected!
So it's my turn? You won't hear me complaining. It's what I'm here for, right?
Ah, seems like I might be outmatched! Maybe I should try a little harder. It wouldn't be as fun to lose completely right away.
My, my, what a predicament I'm in. You're giving me a real run for my money.
Oh dear, things really aren't looking good for me, are they? Well, I suppose you've earned a reward for playing so well.
Down but not out, so they say. It might surprise you what I can do when backed into a corner!
Okay. Your hair is dumb.

I don't really raise them on the farm; they just live on the riverbank too. They're wild pigs who like to misbehave and get into trouble. I just make sure they all know their place when I have the patience for it.
Not the people, the men. Always coming up to me, asking me dumb question after dumb question. It's such a nuisance.
Well, you've got to do something with your life. Might as well take your chances and become a masochist.
My, my, you're like a dog chasing a car. Even if you caught me, it's not like you'd even know what to do.
You see right through me, Kaz. It's so rare for a man to see me... see me for who I am and see me... as I am...
I'll do it for you, Kaz, if you ask. My tongue, tracing the length of your dick. My warm lips, wrapped around you. Servicing you with my mouth, my throat. Do you want me to, Kaz? Do you?
Plan? Scheme? Hang on, you've lost me. Go back and start from the beginning.
Bobobo, I'm really not that picky. I want what any woman wants: someone who is honest and kind. Someone who makes me laugh. Someone who makes life fun.
Oh? "Grill your cheese?" Is that a euphemism for something sexy?
Oh? And what exactly would you be referring to?
It's not like I'm telling them to buzz off. I just want them to get down in the mud where they belong and show the proper gratitude. If a guy can't even do that, then he might as well scram.
Come now, you're not shrinking violet. I bet when you're really in the mood, you're the one who makes all the bold moves.
I haven't met anyone who can dish it out like I can, but I bet you'd blush if you knew just how much I can take. How much I have taken in the past.
Hm, well, it helps when what you're hunting is prideful and dumb. There's no cure for that second thing, but paralyzing them with fear fixes the first one.
No, you were right the first time. I do live on a farm right on the bank of the river. There was nothing there but grass, so I just came along and made use of it.

The community on the river is fairly self-sufficient. We all share what we have and the fruits of our labor. We don't need money because we're paid in the expectation that everyone will pull their weight.
The only way to know for sure, Roll, is to ask them. It takes a lot of bravery to do it, but all the heartbreak in the world can be washed away by just one person returning your affection.
I think the punishment should fit the crime. Not that I think he could really ever in his lifetime repay you for such a special treat.
My, my, there's no need to thank me. It's just my nature.
What can I say? I can't help but help out when I see a poor, helpless little thing.
Oh, it's nothing special at all. I'm like anyone else: I just want to coddle helpless little creatures.
He'll just have to make the most of this opportunity. It'd be a shame if he completely choked and wasted it...
Well, it's still possible he could completely waste this opportunity. After all, we should probably expect him to play completely incompetently.
Oh, but a pirate takes what isn't theirs. I haven't taken anything from anyone. If anything, it's them who are trying to take my things from me.
The way I see it, the big wigs trying to shut me down are the pirates. I haven't taken anything that isn't mine, but they want to swoop in like they know what's best? Hardly.
Don't worry, Meia. It really is quite simple. What you're seeing is just how men and women interact normally. Anything else would be out of the ordinary.
You see, Meia, this is the natural way in which men and women communicate with one another. I'm not treating them any differently than they expect to be treated.
Cows, chicken, sheep, and some horses. I'm a dairy farmer, so I don't raise my animals for eating but because they provide us with something useful.
Since it's a dairy farm, I just keep animals who are useful, not for eating. I've got chickens for eggs, sheep for wool, and cows for milk.
And they love it! It's why they're here. Men are just like that.
Oh, I wouldn't bother feeling sorry for them. They're savoring every moment of it. They are men, after all.
And tell me, Dwight: where do sad, little men like you belong, hm?
And just where, Dwight, do you presume a whimpering little wreck like you belongs?
